definition[0]: if you work in house, you work at the offices of a company or organization, not at home
definition[1]: working within a company or organization
example[0]: We have an in-house training unit.
definition[2]: if a job is done in-house, it is done within an organization, especially by the organizationâ€™s own staff
example[2]: Most of its advertising continues to be handled in-house.
example[3]: Government agencies discover they can pay less by contracting out jobs instead of doing them in-house.
